website_summaries.verdict: A highly affordable option from a manufacturer that's  passionate about getting kids active and healthy. Offers loads of opportunity for exercise.
pros: Swings, a monkey bar, and a slide take care of three sought-after, kid-approved features, while the trampoline is a novel and irresistible way to get little ones moving
Thoughtfully designed with a canopy for shade
cons: The canopy only covers the swings and monkey bar in the center of the structure

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I (women) put it together by myself! It was easy to do. HOWEVER, there was no way I could put the trampoline together by myself. The until is made very well and I'm pleased. We put a baby pool at the bottom of the slide and created a water slide. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the Playground
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Playground....beware this set is built for toddlers. My two (2) year old Granddaughter loves her Playground, especially the trampoline. Easily assembled and ready for action within an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie R Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to the person with the suggestion on how to do the trampoline!!! Thank you, Heather!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Sagna

customer_reviews.title: They love this, especially the water attachment
customer_reviews.text: My kids are 8 and 2 years old. They love this, especially the water attachment! I love the shade feature and the fact you can move the trampoline. The middle bar is kind of useless unless you want to do pull ups or hang there. Its still a great buy though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons new swing set
customer_reviews.text: The swing set is a gift for my 4 grandsons. They were so happy & have enjoyed playing. There is something different on playset for each of them to enjoy. Best Buy ever
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Is definitely worth the money. It took two of us to put it together. The only down side is the instructions. Is a bit confusing when it comes down to the screws. Otherwise worth the money my kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Yavi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy to install. My 3 yr old daughter loves it! We haven’t had a storm yet so I’m not sure how to top will do.
customer_reviews.author: JandR

customer_reviews.title: Kids love and it was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Kids love and it was super easy to put together. By myself it took maybe an hour and a half
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I really was unsure if they would be cheaply made. But after putting it together I found it’s very sturdy and has a lot of cool features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great swingset son loves it but we where short one bolt and nut took 2 trips to the local hardware store to get the parts we needed other than that would highly recommend this. It's a little pricey but will get years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandson's 3rd birthday. It was worth every penny and put together quickly with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Bull

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with this equipment. It’s sturdy and our son likes it. Our only complaint is none of the parts or pieces were labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Rae Flores

customer_reviews.title: tear a part on te top
customer_reviews.text: it is not almost 2 months of using but the top part was tear apart. Do not buy it. customer support not good either.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian tran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was easy to put together and got a lot of use from kids and grankids
customer_reviews.author: Darin73507

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! Bolts were in place which made the assembly a breeze. Good quality material. The trampoline is tough to assemble but with the tool provided and two people it was manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to set up. My kids love it! Quick with delivery and price was fair! Great outdoor playground
customer_reviews.author: alex holm

customer_reviews.title: Very weak
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and the hose broke in 1st week. They said they was sending one out but I never got it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: duane doak

customer_reviews.title: Really nice easy to put together but the sun block on ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice easy to put together but the sun block on top broke as some as it got a little windy.
customer_reviews.author: Weber

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. My granddaughters play on this all the time! It’s really sturdy for young kids
customer_reviews.author: Leeza

customer_reviews.title: Great swingset.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I chose it. Have had it for a few weeks, I like the sunshade.
customer_reviews.author: kristi holmes

customer_reviews.title: Happy Boy
customer_reviews.text: Love that it arrived early! Thank you so much my 4 yr ood is excited and has been bugging me to build it
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: make sure to line up the crossbeams for the connection with the slide or else you'll have to do double work.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME ITEM... Took about an hour in a half to put together with a power drill very sturdy ... my son and daughter couldn't wait for me to finish to jump, swing and slide!
customer_reviews.author: Armcarr86

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could find anything locally
customer_reviews.text: Grandson LOVES it! Better than I could find anything locally.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Plimpton

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly/ misleading pictures
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were a pain. Items were labeled in the book but no visible labels on the individual pieces. Items featured in the photos of the product were not available to( red extended slide platform).
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other prices very reasonably! But we only had the set for 2 days and the shade has already blown or broke off and no longer have! And it doesnt have rail or net on the slide like I thought and pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: They love it and so do I
customer_reviews.text: My cousin just put ours together for my grandchildren. They love it and so do I. Love the shade and mist sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: gloria njoku

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing buy! Our daughter who is 4 loves it and it was just a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: NPC Bikini Makaela Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Easier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to build alone only took 4hrs, slide was a bit of a pain to get together at certain places.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: its smaller than it looks but still functional and a good buy, went together well
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews for this and looked for two months at swing sets for my 4 year old. I decided on this one because of the price and the options it has. the swings in my opinion seem kind of week and worried that the 7year old next door will brake it but seems to be holding out so far. its smaller than it looks but still functional and a good buy, went together well; did it myself in 4 hrs. (and a beer) can be done faster I think if your really want to (not hard other than putting on the springs for the trampoline hence the beer.
customer_reviews.author: Hink1978

customer_reviews.title: ... little smaller than what we expected but still a good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than what we expected but still a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, but the canopy pole broke in about 3 days due to wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ... frame seems very well built and the finish is great. Was pretty easy to put together also
customer_reviews.text: Metal frame seems very well built and the finish is great. Was pretty easy to put together also. The only thing I could complain about is the canopy looks like it could be blown off easy.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little set but
customer_reviews.text: Great little set but..... The trampoline is difficult to put together! One of the springs broke off. My son went to slide down the slide and he was stuck at the top because it isn't slippery. Not sure if it's because the plastic needs to weather some or something. Hoping next year he can actually slide. The swings hold a lot of water if it rains. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 3 year old great granddaughter for her birthday
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old great granddaughter for her birthday, and she LOVES it! I gave only 4 stars because it's a little flimsy, but it's only rated for kids under 100 pounds. All in all I'm very pleased with the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The swings are molded plastic, and look too small for most kids in the age range it is designed for. Haven't put up the slide yet but it looks flimsy. The trampoline is good and the bars are sturdy so I think I will replace the swing seats.
customer_reviews.author: Janean Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: keeps the children entertained
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swing set and my grand daughter loves it. I am knocking off a star because the sun covers does not hold up even in a slight breeze. Had to take the sun cover off because it was breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Playset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 5th birthday. She was super excited and has played on it everyday. The only thing that leaves a little to be desired is the bar in the center...maybe a grip would be nice? Overall great set that is pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: anne k.

customer_reviews.title: hold up well so far easy to assemble even the trampoline that everyone said was ...
customer_reviews.text: hold up well so far easy to assemble even the trampoline that everyone said was hard to stretch. Good people just turn the triangle metal connectors on an angle it give the little extra distance needed to connect all the metal connectors. then turn them back
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Different and just right!!!not to big. Not to small.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Set delivered in a timely manner. It was perfect for our needs. I looked around and this set provided all the units we wanted in a size that was functional for our yard. The chains for the swing were a bit short. Being able to to break up the units to set up different areas of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: noxie

customer_reviews.title: Nope! Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Nope! Don’t bother. Bugs in tent post-literally split open the day we put it together. Pieces missing to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Allen

customer_reviews.title: great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and well made.it wasn't hard to put together eaither

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks good bolts for cross member between legs where to long..other than that grand daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: terry l grant

customer_reviews.title: Nice playset. Small but just right for a 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice playset. Small but just right for a 2 and 4 year old. They love the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy8

customer_reviews.title: otherwise shipped in excellent condition fast
customer_reviews.text: One nut/bolt set was missing, otherwise shipped in excellent condition fast. Easy enough to set up. Ideal for our granddaughter who received this on her third birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Durham

customer_reviews.title: awesome swing set
customer_reviews.text: awesome swing set. only this I do not like is one of the fiberglass rods that hold top has stated splintering
customer_reviews.author: Thomas saxon

customer_reviews.title: My order came two days before it was scheduled to ...
customer_reviews.text: My order came two days before it was scheduled to be here which was so exciting because we were having a party and we were able to put it up so the kids could play on it.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Noland

customer_reviews.title: Make sure what you advertise is the same as what we your buyers get
customer_reviews.text: Picture of the playground and what I received was very disapointing. The swing was to hold five to eight years old but the instructions way totally different when I received it for my grandkids Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This came a week early and came with a mister some how!!! It was easy to put together and everything was in perfect condition!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten slauter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great my son loves it very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended <3
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic buy! Very easy to put together and the kids love it!!
customer_reviews.author: anna hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect smaller-scale play set for our backyard
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect smaller-scale play set for our backyard. My grandchildren are 2 and 3 1/2 and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Larke

customer_reviews.title: The 3 year old absolutely loves the trampoline and the bar to hold on to while jumping is perfect and she feels very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Gave this cute playground to our two granddaughters aged 1 year and 3 years. The 3 year old absolutely loves the trampoline and the bar to hold on to while jumping is perfect and she feels very comfortable jumping. The little one likes to sit on the trampoline while big sister jumps. Since she has to hold on to the bar still to jump, it is safe for the 1 year old to sit behind her while mommy is closely watching. It has been a big hit. Happy Grandmother!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith S. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Love the swing set. It did come with some defects that I just emailed the company about so hopefully they email me back soon with a resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Noelle Swain

customer_reviews.title: not in love but not a bad swing set
customer_reviews.text: We have had this set since 2015. our canopy broke off within the first month but the whole set its self is still going and usable, we dont bring it in for the winter we do not do anything else to take care of it but its still standing strong 3 years later
customer_reviews.author: Cari H.

customer_reviews.title: The canopy is junk!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a couple of other reviews the canopy broke just a few weeks after purchase! The poles that hold up the canopy split in half on all sides after one light rain shower. Total junk at this point! If they were offer a refund, I would gladly take it apart and send it back! Hopefully Royal Blue Shipping Corp helps me with at least a replacement part..
customer_reviews.author: crackberry user

customer_reviews.title: So.much fun
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. And besides the trampoline it was easy to assemble. My daughter loves jumping and swinging and sliding after school while I male dinner.
customer_reviews.author: amb

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment..
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come with all the pieces. Therefore, we were unable to assrmble the slide. What a disappointment...
customer_reviews.author: H. r.

product_meta.title: Kids Outdoor Playground Includes Trampoline, Swings and Slide
product_meta.description: This playground metal swing set features 4 activities that will keep 6 kids busy at the same time Fitness Jumper Trampoline: Develops a sense of balance and space and also can enhance full body coordination. Strengthens the legs, knees and hamstring muscle groups Swings: Swinging burns calories and engages muscle groups, particularly hamstrings and quadriceps. It can build endurance in the knees and hips as well as works the AB muscles, shoulders, upper back and neck Monkey Bar: Builds arm strength and helps keep off excess weight through exercise. Also the arms, shoulders and chest will strengthen using the Monkey Bar Fitness Slide: Develops and builds kid's confidence with height and gravity Sunshade: Adds a beautiful appearance and provides some shade when kids are on the swings or monkey bar

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
